title: Wikileaks releases disturbing communications between faker and Tryndamere, proving worlds is rigged
body:
What I'm about to show you was taken from one of Hillary clintons emails, therefore we can only determine this is true.

H-ClintIN@yahoo: I got a request from Marc to suppress scripted league of legends esports for cash. Let's do it.
BDaManClinton@hotmail: ok honey. 
@TheRealDonaldTrump: it's gonna be great. I'm gonna build a wall around Korea.

The next email proceeds between Tryndamere (Marc Merrill) and the Clinton Foundation with Trump.

MarkyMarC69: ok so we are good? No potential legislation or potential prosecution against us?
H-ClintIN@yahoo: yep, don't be greedy.
MarkuMarC69: did you just call me fucking greedy?
BDaManClinton@Hotmail: she said needy.
@TheRealDonaldTrump: I think she said grab her by the pu-
BDaManClinton@Hotmail: See? It's true that you can be reasonable. Good luck.
MarkMarC69: ok thanks guys. 

The next set of conversations exposed is between Faker and Tryndamere proving worlds is indeed rigged/scripted.

@Skt1FakeR: ok we good? Make it go 5 games so my video game legacy is in tact XD
MarkyMarC69: yup it's been settled. We will pay off SSG and Regi to not actually win.
@Skt1FakeR: excellent, ella come in a manzana jajajaja XD
MarkyMarC69: don't call me fucking greedy.
@Skt1FakeR: I said you're rather meaty. 
MarkyMarC69: oh sorry. Cya in LA. 
@Skt1FakeR: ok

_____________________________________________

Honestly this is a disgrace. I demand Riot Tryndamere step down immediately and leave the company in the hands of an honest, well behaved citizen who doesn't engage in hooligan activity. The FBI will be contacting you soon, Marc. You did this. This is all your fault.
